verses.text: Ha t'a sti' ha ha' t'a yol yic Babilonia, onh em k'ojan ayic ix ko naancot Sion, ix onh ok' b'ian.
Ix cak'k'e locan te' arpa t'a sk'ab' te' tak'u ay t'a sti' ha ha' chi'.
Ha heb' ix onh ik'anb'at icha t'a preso, ix b'uchwaj heb' t'ayonh, ix yalan heb' icha tik: B'itananhec t'a tzalajk'olal, a sb'ital Sion tze b'itej t'ayonh, xchi heb'.
¿Tom ol ko b'itej b'it yic Jehová t'a lum ch'oc chonhab'il? xco chi.
Tato sb'at satk'olal Jerusalén wuuj, satocab' sjelanil in wach' k'ab' tik in chalan te' warpa.
Tato manhxo naanoc Jerusalén wuuj, tato manhxa pax in gana t'ay t'a yichanh pax tas snib'ej in k'ool, canocab' lotznaj wak' t'a in joom, yic wach' manhxo ol yal-laj in b'itani.
Mamin Jehová, nacot heb' aj Edom, yujto ayic ix yamchaj chonhab' Jerusalén, ix yal heb' icha tik: Pojequemi, pojequemi, masanto scheclaj cimientoal yich, xchi heb'.
Ex aj Babilonia, ol ex satpaxeloc. Te wach' yic mach ol ak'anek' spak chukal tas ix onh eyutej.
Te wach' yic mach ol yaman heb' eyuninal, ol smak'anpoj sjolom heb' t'a spatictac k'een k'een.
